code: import React from'react';import'./Navbar.css';import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const location=useLocation();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"navbar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"nav-links",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:location.pathname==='/'?'active':'',children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:"Home"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:location.pathname==='/education'?'active':'',children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/education",children:"Education"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:location.pathname==='/experience'?'active':'',children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/experience",children:"Experience"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:location.pathname==='/hobbies'?'active':'',children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/hobbies",children:"Hobbies"})})]})});};export default Navbar;
